member.name: T:SL1.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SL1.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SL1.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Checks if the batch has already been sieved.

member.name: M:SL1.SL1.ShowCustomMessage(System.String,System.String,System.Drawing.Color,System.String)
member.summary: Show a custom message with two languages, a color, and an icon type. iconType (e.g. "error", "info", "warning") will tell FormMessage which icon to use.

member.summary: Constructor that takes a message string and arranges controls in a vertically centered style.

member.summary: Displays an information icon in the PictureBox.

member.name: M:SL1.FormMessage.SetIconError
member.summary: Displays an error icon in the PictureBox.

member.name: M:SL1.FormMessage.SetIconWarning
member.summary: Displays a warning icon in the PictureBox.

member.summary: If you want to prevent the user from closing via 'X', handle FormClosing here.
